systems.name: Skill Control System
systems.description: Defines various skill control types for mobile gaming, focusing on UX/UI design and responsiveness.
systems.mechanics: Includes Instant (Tapcast), Direction (Skillshot), Ground (AOE select), Channeling (Hold skill), and Cancel control types.
systems.objectives: Standardize input methods for diverse skills, support friendly UX, optimize diversity in skill types.
interactions: Instant skills activate immediately upon tapping.
Direction skills require directional input with real-time adjustments.
Ground skills involve selecting an area of effect with color-coded feedback.
Channeling skills are maintained by holding and can be canceled by releasing.
Cancel function changes the display color of casting range and skill direction.

logic_rules.description: Instant skills activate immediately when tapped without requiring any dragging or additional input.
logic_rules.effect: Skill activates instantly with zero latency.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/combat_module_tank_war_mobile_skill_control_system/[Combat Module] [Tank War] Mobile Skill Control System/auto/images/edfda5e82d4c9324afac91957a72c4ede151e70d5ecec9d7219cbb15caf50045.jpg

logic_rules.description: Direction skills allow players to adjust the casting direction in real-time before releasing to cast.
logic_rules.trigger: Player holds and drags the skill icon.
logic_rules.effect: Casting direction adjusts in real-time; releasing casts the skill in the chosen direction.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/combat_module_tank_war_mobile_skill_control_system/[Combat Module] [Tank War] Mobile Skill Control System/auto/images/edfda5e82d4c9324afac91957a72c4ede151e70d5ecec9d7219cbb15caf50045.jpg

logic_rules.description: Ground skills involve selecting a specific area of effect with visual feedback indicating valid or invalid positions.
logic_rules.trigger: Player holds and drags the skill icon to select an area.
logic_rules.effect: Area of effect is displayed with color-coded feedback; releasing casts the skill at the selected location.
logic_rules.source_note: Table Analysis: Image Path: /Users/madeinheaven/Documents/GitHub/AI_Agent/output/combat_module_tank_war_mobile_skill_control_system/[Combat Module] [Tank War] Mobile Skill Control System/auto/images/edfda5e82d4c9324afac91957a72c4ede151e70d5ecec9d7219cbb15caf50045.jpg

logic_rules.description: Channeling skills require continuous holding to maintain the effect, which can be canceled by releasing or being interrupted.
logic_rules.effect: Effect is maintained while holding; releasing or being interrupted cancels the effect.

logic_rules.description: Players can cancel ongoing actions using a dedicated cancel button displayed on the screen.
logic_rules.trigger: Player moves the joystick towards the cancel button.

requirements.title: Standardized Input Methods

requirements.acceptance_criteria: All skill types must have clear and consistent input methods that align with the defined control types.
